column1: “I’ve been having blurred vision that seems to be getting worse. I want to see a private eye specialist.”
“I was told I might need cataract surgery and want to speak to an ophthalmologist who does this regularly.”
“I have ongoing eye pain and sensitivity to light and need an eye doctor to assess what’s going on.”
“My optician said I should see an ophthalmologist about possible glaucoma. Who should I see?”
“I have diabetes and was advised to get my eyes checked by a specialist for retinal problems.”
“I’m getting frequent floaters and flashes and want to see an eye specialist urgently.”
“I’ve been diagnosed with macular degeneration and want to explore treatment options with a specialist.”
“I have double vision that comes and goes and want to see an ophthalmologist who deals with complex cases.”
“I’m considering laser eye surgery and want a consultation with a specialist who offers refractive procedures.”
“I have dry eyes that haven’t improved with drops and want to see someone who specialises in ocular surface disease.”
“I had eye surgery in the past and now have new symptoms. I want a second opinion from an experienced ophthalmologist.”
“My child has been referred for a possible eye condition and I’m looking for a paediatric ophthalmologist.”
“I was told I may need retinal laser treatment and want to speak to a retinal specialist.”
“I have eyelid problems affecting my vision and want to see an ophthalmologist who does eyelid surgery.”
“I’ve been experiencing sudden vision loss in one eye and need to see an eye specialist as soon as possible.”
“I have keratoconus and want to discuss specialist management and possible procedures.”
“I’m looking for an ophthalmologist who specialises in uveitis or inflammatory eye conditions.”
“I wear contact lenses but keep getting eye infections and want to see a specialist about this.”
“I was advised to get an OCT scan and want to see an ophthalmologist who can interpret and manage the results.”
“I want a comprehensive private eye health assessment because of a strong family history of eye disease.”
